title: What Will Come (has already come)
brief_description: What Will Come (Has Already Come) (2007), a film seen in a cylindrical mirror on a table, is composed of revolving images â€“ from familiar carousel animals through to tanks and aeroplanes.

constellations_other.name: Power and infamy
constellations_other.description: Beginning with an anamorphic image of Napoleon III, this Constellation focuses on representations of the distorted perspective of patriarchal power.
